Herkes İnfinite için efsane şeyler söyledi, o kadar büyüdü ki gözümde indirime girince hemen aldım 1. ve 2. oyunu da hikayesine yabancı olmamak için oynamaya başladım ilk iki oyun o kadar güzel ki gerek atmosferi olsun gerek hikayesi hatta steampunk havası bile çok iyiydi ikisinide 2 günde bitirdim hemen asıl amacıma ulaşmak için infiniteyi oynamam lazımdı ve o kadar güzel işlenmiş bir havadan sonra inifniteyi oynamak çok sıkıcı geldi resmen bitirmek için oynadım.
生化奇兵什么时候出个太空版感受下

Bioshock Infinite não é um Rework da saga, e sim uma nova história envolvente com mistérios e desenrolares que vão te fazer ficar pensativo por horas. Trazendo um novo protagonista em um mundo totalmente diferente da cidade submarina que éramos acostumados, Bioshock Infinite traz elementos modificados de seus antecessores junto a personagens novos extremamente envolventes, dando destaque a Elizabeth que consegue fazer com que o jogador se apaixone pela sua personalidade.

•	Em minha opinião algumas coisas poderiam ter sido melhor trabalhadas como a mecânica dos Vigores, que substituíram os plasmídeos, que anteriormente eram essenciais no desenrolar da trama e trazendo um plus aos combos, os vigores, no entanto não conseguem alcançar esse potencial sendo mal balanceados e quase sempre inúteis. 
•	O limite de carregar duas armas apenas no jogo é questionável, tem um ponto positivo de não seguir o estilo Half-Life de ter um arsenal quase todo inútil em seu inventário, mas limita as possibilidades em apenas dois equipamentos.
•	O jogo traz um limite em relação ao seu sistema monetário que te limita bastante em atualizações de vigores e armas, então a escolha deve ser feita sabiamente.
•	No decorrer do jogo se encontram as armas da “Vox Populi”, que apesar de serem meras skins são retratadas como uma arma diferente, tendo de ter munições e ser melhoradas separadamente. É estranho a adição de itens assim logo nos capítulos finais, podiam ter sido tratadas como deveriam, meras skins.
•	Caso você seja um jogador que busca platinar as conquistas, recomendo fortemente manter anotada os locais e quais conquistas devem ser pegas, pois existem locais, que se você ultrapassar, mesmo que sem querer, jamais poderá retornar, tento que rejogar o game para conseguir aquela conquista perdida.
•	Diferente dos trailers Eliabeth perde muito suas capacidades, sua companhia na campanha não é desagradável, pelo contrário, ela é divertida, meiga, doce, e sua evolução de personagem é impactante, mas em relação as ideias iniciais, ela tinha muito mais a oferecer.

Por fim as DLCs Burial at Sea, são um complemento essencial que veio para sanar as duvidas dos jogadores após o final do jogo principal, as DLCs te trazem de volta a Rapture, explicando e expandindo as possibilidades do universo de Bioshock, sem dúvida teve momentos nostálgicos e emocionantes, considero até que as DLCs são o quarto jogo.

Sem duvida a saga Bioshock impactou na minha vida, e agradeço Irrational Games por ter se dedicado a essa incrível saga que deixa saudades e um grande amor em nossos corações.

Эта игра - замечательный опыт шутера, в котором весь акцент отходит на составляющую сюжета и повествования.
В действительности пройти Bioshock Infinite можно, относясь просто как к шутеру, но не нужно. Ведь так-же просто можно отнестись к тому, как отбивается такт.
Путаница в памяти героя хорошо помогает себя с ним ассоциировать, ведь мы так-же как и он ничего не понимаем в происходящем. 
Парящий город Колумбия, предстающий утопией с идеологией на пророчествах одного человека.
Ведущие борьбу меньшинства, рабство и искаженная история, скрывающая финальный аккорд сюжета, где раскроется важность решений, где 
[spoiler] Он - Захари Комсток. 	[/spoiler]
[spoiler] Он - Букер Дэвит. 	        [/spoiler]
[spoiler] Он и то, и другое              [/spoiler]
Таким образом здесь такт - это только основа музыки, в которой затрагивается тема философии простых переменных, способных изменить суть вещей.

Second Playthrough roughly 3 years ago, i still remember how i scratch my head and thinking for whole day just to figure out the ending is, feel dumbfounded, mesmerized, and fascinated at the same time. Best storyline ever.

Всё что касается сюжета, его подачи, а также мира в котором сие действие происходит - великолепно, а вот шутерная часть слабовата, скучна и практически полностью повторяет оную из первой части. А боёвка, надо сказать, занимает процентов шестьдесят от игры.

闪退解决方法：
鼠标右键我的电脑，点管理，事件查看器，管理事件，右边会出来错误选项，选择appmodel，bioshock，常规下面的方框往下拉，会出来错误模块路径（一般是xaudio），在我的电脑里搜索该路径，最后将所有搜索出来的文件删除就好了。

pass：可能会有未知副作用

如果嫌麻烦，可以直接在我的电脑搜索XAudio2_7.dll，删除搜索出来的文件就ok了（一般都是这个问题）

Yet again BioShock blows me away. This a very well made game in my opinion, well optimized, great gameplay, and an intriguing storyline. The ending reminded me of the movie Inception in a few ways. Got it on sale for like 15 bucks with DLC included..... Great deal, do yourself a favour and get this game. 9/10.
Has an amazing story and its fun you should buy it

This is the first BioShock game that I have ever played so I may need to go back and play the older games because I really enjoyed this game. The story was just fantastic and the world is so immersive. I actually purchased it several years ago while stuck in a hospital bed and I was playing it with a MacBook Pro at the time. I didn't get to finish it at the time so I played it halfway. Fast forward to 2017 and I built a new gaming PC and this game looked amazing. I finally finished it today! You should really play it. There are a lot of gun battle scenes so if you enjoy them you'll have an even better time. Most of the scenes are easy although I did die about 2 times throughout the game so there are some challenges when you least expect them.

Вроде графика и стиль отличные, стрельба и геймплей приятные, сюжет...
Меня просто тошнит от перемещений во времени/мультивселенных. 
Концовка (на мой взгляд) оставляет тебя в аху... но не обьясняет единой вселенной bioshock и даже не ставит в ней точку.
1) Откуда у Элизабет эти способности?
2) Уничтожены ли все мультивселенные? Если да, то что в "правильной" вселенной?
Я бы был доволен любым обьяснением но его НЕТ! Даже Бездарностьэффект 3 оставил меня более удовлетворённым.

Fantastic Game!

This game has had the best story of any game I have ever played.
Fantastic character development, voice acting, and much more.

The music was fantastic, and the atmosphere was fenominal.

The story is parallel with three poems written by Marlowe, Raleigh, and Williams about a concept known as Pastoral Idealism. The shepard of the poems preach that the country and this world has amazing beauties that will sustain you and pleasure you. The counter is the anti-sheppard view that states that these beliefs are incompetent, as the pleasures of the country are temporary, ideological, and lack elemental humanism.

Gameplay/FPS is okay, mediocre a little bit, but does not distract from the story.

Probably the best game I have ever played. 10/10.

One of the few PC games of the new generation, that meets the quality of the console exlusive games.

Pros: beautiful art style, perfect writing, fun gameplay, replayability,

Cons: the gameplay is dumbed down compared to the first Bioshock, you can only carry 2 guns

Still a masterpiece. We will never get games like this again. 
CD Project Red remains the only developer, who will create similar quality games while not selling their souls to Sony.

Devrim gibi bir hikayesi,şahane grafik ve oynanışıyla aynı zamanda son derece eğlenceli bölümleriyle bir yandan olay örgüsünü anlamaya çalışıp diğer yandan da deli gibi birilerini öldürdüğümüz eşine nadir rastlanacak türden bir oyun "BioShock İnfinite".İlk başlarda hikayesi bana oldukça sıradan gelmişti.Her oyunda olan şey bunda da var gibiydi.Onu kurtar,birilerini öldür bla bla...Oyun da zaten size neler olduğunu hemen açıklamıyor.Oyunun sadece aksiyondan ibaret olduğunu zannetmiştim taa ki oyunu oynadıkça gördüm ki hikayesi en derinlere kadar indi.Hiç tahmin edemeyeceğim bir hikaye ile karşı karşıya kaldım.Hele hele o son sahneden sonra her şey yavaş yavaş yerine oturmaya başladı.Dediğim gibi hikayesi görünür de basit gibi dursada oyunun her yerinde bir hikaye var gibiydi.Bir çok şeyi kaçırmış olabilirim hala kafamda soru işaretleri var bu yüzden bu oyun 2 defa oynanmalı diye düşünüyorum.Bir kaç ay sonra yeniden başlayıp kaçırdığım şeyler var mı görmek istiyorum ya da bir yayıncının videosunu izlerim.(I am not sure)
Doğrusu son zamanlarda bu tür oyunlara olan açlığım bu oyunla biraz dinmiş oldu.Diyecek çok şeyim var da fazla uzatmak istemiyorum.Ben en iyisi gidiyim de kafama takılan soruları sorup cevaplandırmaya çalışıyım :D

Bioshock Infinite is the first Bioshock game I have played. The feel of the game - the graphics, sound, atmosphere - is stunning. Very crisp colors, smooth animations. I cought myself wandering around the cities just to see the details of the world created. 
The story line is linear, not open world. But the story told is great. You are Booker DeWitt, and must rescue Elisabeth from her prison in a floating city.

The game basically evolve around combat missions. There is a story leading up to a combat scene. After the combat you pick up health and ammunitions, then on to the next mission.
There is no cheat mode unfortunately, so being an incredibly lousy gamer like myself, you die a lot. The combat scenes can be very confusing, and if you are not carefull you will be attacked from all angles, unable to grasp who or what is attacking you.

It's not the longest game. I played it on easy level on 11.5 hours. That is not much gameplay per dollar if you compare the game to Fallout or Far Cry. But the incredible scenery and the smooth and crisp story line makes it up for that.

The Bioshock series is one of those must-play games because of the graphics, the atmosphere, the story. 2K games did a good job on this one. Next time they should create a truly open-world version, allowing you to really enjoy the amazing scenery they have created.

One of the classics of the video game history. Unique story telling and dramatic scripting made this game a true epic!
In my mind, this is the Half-Life 2 of 2010s.
5/5 Best game I've played in a long long time. The story was amazing!~
"What`s done is done. What`s done...Will be done. "

[h1]BioShock Infinite - третья часть в серии "BioShock", но на этот раз действия игры не в подводном городе "Восторг", а в воздушной "Колумбии".[/h1]
В начале нам дают на первый взгляд простую задачу - сгонять в город, да забрать девушку Элизабет, но, как потом оказывается - всё не так просто, и сюжет мощный, который после первого прохождения и читания объяснений сюжета можно и вовсе не понять. Я лично, когда проходил в первый раз особо не понял, чё к чему, а во второй раз вкатило, и понял суть.
По геймплею - бегаем, мочим врагов различных, используем способности, в общем, как и в прошлых биошоках, только тут патрон полно. 
Персонажи - из запоминающихся только Букер(главный герой) и Элизабет( та, которую нам нужно найти в городе)
Также отмечу сюжетные дополнения, а их два - оба возвращают нас в Восторг, в ДЛС Элизабет немного изменилась, также будет одно дополнение, где мы за неё играем - это длс с упором на стелс. Однако, дополнения хоть и интересные, но короткие.
Можно ещё много описывать, но в эту игру надо поиграть самому, я играл во 2 биошок и инфинити, инфинити понравился намного больше. Это шедевр, ведьмак от мира шутеров. 
12/10

Este jogo ao contrário dos seus antecessores, não se passa em Rapture mas sim numa cidade no céu chamada Columbia, mas como os seus antecessores é um FPS em que o personagem tem armas e poderes (chamados Vigors e não Plasmids como nos anteriores). A história gira em torno de salvar uma rapariga chamada Elizabeth. E aqui ao contrário do que acontecia em Raptura assistimos a uma Columbia a desmoronar-se devido aos confrontos entre os Vox Populi e os Fundadores. O jogo possui uns gráficos muito bonitos, um bom port e uma mecânica de combate muito boa e fluida. Por isso recomendo. Dou nota: 8/10.

Jack of many trades, master of none.

as wide as the sea but as deep as a puddle.

Ahhh Que se puede decir de esta obra maestra... Una Excelente Historia,Unos Graficos Hermosos,Su variada jugabilidad... Bioshock infinite es uno de los juegos que no te aburren en cualquier momento,te mantienen activo y cuenta una gran historia a la vez... Esta precuela de la saga Bioshock es increible.. Sus personajes y Enemigos,Sus Paisajes que son hermosos.. La variedad de armas y escenarios que hay...Si terminaste este juego y no te quedaste satisfecho,Tranquilo todavia tienes Burial at sea Episode 1 y 2... Que cuenta la continuacion de Bioshock infinite en Rapture.. Lo recomiendo al 1000% A este gran juego... No te vas a arrepentir en ningun momento... Solo compralo y disfruta cada momento que son unicos....

Mini bosses have their own style, attacks, and weakpoints (no two mini bosses are the same)

Cons:
Common enemies are very similar (I'm nitpicking because there's nothing bad about this game)
Really nothing else

我今天就是要吹爆生化奇兵！
一开始我并不知道有这么一款游戏，是看了某恐怖骑士熊的深度剧情解说的视频时才知道的（虽然弃坑了），看视频的时候我还在想这跟生化有个毛线的关系啊！标题党啊！但耐着性子看下去后就慢慢觉得名字什么的不重要了甚至还觉的还带感。
虽然有些人说看不懂剧情，所以我要想大家推荐看熊哥的视频（虽然弃坑了），目前只更了九期但也已经快到游戏结束的地方了，而且剧情也讲的差不多了，只要自己亲自玩了游戏就会明白了，要说明白的一点的就是不要去优酷看因为优酷删了几期，具体原因看熊哥的30多分钟的自白，要看完整的生化奇兵请去B站搜索一名叫间月的UP主，他是一名搬运工大部分熊哥的视频他都有搬运。但还是希望大家入一下正自己玩自己体验才是最有意思的。
（话说我好像把这游戏强行玩成了辐射4）
对不起，伊丽莎白，我来晚了。
剧情没得说

Déjà, l'histoire de ce Bioshock est extrêmement complexe mais très épatante et réussie, même si la fin peut sembler décevante. Bien que certaines phrases et certaines cinématiques peuvent sembler redondantes ou déjà vues, l'immersion est assez extraordinaire en compagnie d'Elizabeth. On peut d'ailleurs repérer pas mal d'allusions plus ou moins marquantes à l'histoire des USA ou à d'autres thèmes mais pour bien voir tout ça, encore faut-il s'immerger complètement dans le jeu et le faire très minutieusement, et non à la va vite!

Je recommande avant tout ce jeu pour avoir choisi un cadre différent de celui des précédents opus. En effet, le jeu se déroule cette fois-ci dans une ville céleste et les décors sont très riches en couleurs tout comme en détails. De plus, quelques années le séparent du reste de la série et la différence graphique se fait positivement ressentir.

D'un point de vue artistique, je trouve l'environnement typé début XX ème siècle très élégant et animé, auquel se rajoute d'ailleurs une petite touche "Steam Punk" qui lui confère un charme supplémentaire. L'univers du jeu est donc selon moi un de ses grands points forts.

Sur le plan sonore, les musiques sont souvent adapté au contexte, notamment celles jouées lors des combats qui sont assez dynamiques et rythmées. Les doublages français sont corrects et les bruitages généraux sont assez présents et de bonne qualité.
Je vous recommande ouvertement ce jeu pour avoir su mêler un décor sublime et un gameplay nerveux destiné aux fans des FPS, le tout accompagné d'une histoire complexe et d'idées innovantes. Un opus qui mérite entièrement sa place dans la série !

En ce qui concerne les DLC,
La boucle est bouclée... et essentiel si l'on veut presque savoir tout de cette univers encore plein d'interrogation.
Je ne vais pas rentrer dans les détails de l'histoire pour ne gâcher aucune surprise, mais c'en est touchant, presque émouvant de finir cette histoire superbe et riche en rebondissement. En espérant sincèrement que la franchise ne disparaisse pas. 
Merci Monsieur Levine, vous êtes un très grand monsieur du Jeu Vidéo !
(Un peu déçu que la fin réel s'achete)

Una obra maestra, un juego muy completo, una historia que te deja congelado, sin entender la profundidad de esta hasta re jugarlo y que con los dlc hace una conexion increible con el biohock 1, sin dudas si estas aburrido y tienes dinero para comprar este juego hazlo que muy raro seria que te arrepintieras.

I kept hearing great things about this game but after playing Bioshock on my friend's PC and not really liking it all that much I was skeptical about buying this one. I did though and I have no regrets. It's a great FPS Action game and a blueprint for how to do an Escort Quest right, Elizabeth is the best companion I've seen in a video game in ages. Visuals are great, story is amazing and full of twists.

The only minus IMO is that, other than for enjoying the gunplay/vigors some more there is no replay value.

+ Great FPS Action Gameplay
+ Awesome Visuals
+ Great Story set in the Incredible World of Columbia with Some Really Well Done Twists
+ Probably the Best Escort Quest Ever in a Video Game
+ Elizabeth

- No Replayability (Unless for the fun of the gameplay itself)

游戏性： 2 / 4
一手打枪，一手施法算是生化奇兵的一贯特色，本作在系统上也并无亮点，空轨倒是令人耳目一新，可惜用途太少，只有在云端激战时才能发挥威力；
射击、潜行、搜集、解谜，相当全面但是每一方面都很薄弱，后期杀敌颇有重复之感，同样的武器与异能配置便能一路打到结局；

剧情： 3 / 3
正篇的故事首尾照应非常精彩，两部海葬更是让故事回到销魂城，算是“强行”大轮回，同时也完整了无限的剧情；
但是讲故事的方式太晦涩了，通关之后我才意识到这是一款[strike]鬼父题材的游戏[/strike]反王道反英雄的作品，最鲜明的特色就是：[spoiler] 你操纵的主角们都是要死的，嗯 [/spoiler]

画面： 2 / 2
惊艳的天空之城，虽然贴图的质量欠佳但瑕不掩瑜。

音乐 ： 1 / 1
美式乡村音乐，悠扬和紧张的气氛都营造得不错。

综合： 8 / 10
对世界设定的重视程度高于叙事，甚至游戏性也为其让步，后期机械突突突只为看剧情；
美式文化碎片用蒸汽朋克的风格表现出来，反乌托邦的情怀寄寓在独裁的哥伦比亚；
当然，最吸引我的，还是本作的最强AI队友[strike]开锁大王[/strike]伊丽莎白，蹦蹦跶跶就能回血回蓝补满弹药；
[spoiler]可爱，想……[/spoiler]
我在这个游戏里知道了什么叫做量子态，居然是一个科普游戏。
